name: GVSUPLS206FlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill is intended for Grand Valley State University students in Prof. Roberts' American Constitutional Foundations course (PLS 206). This skill will add course information and news about American politics to the user's Flash Briefing.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
